languages.text: While moving, all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Moving through these bloodstained cells costs the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: All bleeding enemies leave a trail on the ground for 1 round. Moving on these cells costs 0 MP for Executioner.

languages.text: Al moverse, todos los enemigos con {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} dejan un rastro de sangre en el suelo que permanece en la casilla durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El movimiento por las casillas ensangrentadas cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} para el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}.
languages.original_text: While moving, all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Moving through these bloodstained cells costs the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al moverse, todos los enemigos con {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} dejan un rastro de sangre en el suelo que permanece en la casilla durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El movimiento por las casillas ensangrentadas cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} para el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}.

languages.text: 移動中、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}状態の敵は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}残る血濡れた足跡を地面に残す。これらの血塗れのセルを通過する際、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の消費{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は0となる。
languages.original_text: While moving, all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Moving through these bloodstained cells costs the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 移動中、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}状態の敵は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}残る血濡れた足跡を地面に残す。これらの血塗れのセルを通過する際、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の消費{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は0となる。

languages.text: 所有{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}的敌人在移动时，都会在地面上留下血迹，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}在这样的血迹上移动时，不会消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: While moving, all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Moving through these bloodstained cells costs the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 所有{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}的敌人在移动时，都会在地面上留下血迹，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}在这样的血迹上移动时，不会消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Solange sie sich bewegen, hinterlassen alle mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} belegten Gegner eine blutige Spur am Boden, die 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang bestehen bleibt. Bewegungen über diese blutbefleckten Zellen kosten den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
languages.original_text: While moving, all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Moving through these bloodstained cells costs the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solange sie sich bewegen, hinterlassen alle mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} belegten Gegner eine blutige Spur am Boden, die 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang bestehen bleibt. Bewegungen über diese blutbefleckten Zellen kosten den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsqu'ils se déplacent, les ennemis souffrant de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} laissent dans leur sillage une traînée de sang qui persiste pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Se déplacer sur ces cases tachées de sang ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} à l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g}.
languages.original_text: While moving, all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Moving through these bloodstained cells costs the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'ils se déplacent, les ennemis souffrant de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} laissent dans leur sillage une traînée de sang qui persiste pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Se déplacer sur ces cases tachées de sang ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} à l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g}.

languages.text: Все противники, страдающие от {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, при движении оставляют за собой кровавый след, который сохраняется в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Перемещение по клеткам, залитым кровью таким образом, не требует для {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
languages.original_text: While moving, all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemies leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Moving through these bloodstained cells costs the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все противники, страдающие от {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, при движении оставляют за собой кровавый след, который сохраняется в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Перемещение по клеткам, залитым кровью таким образом, не требует для {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

Перемещение по клеткам, залитым кровью таким образом, не требует для {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Kanaması{/g} olan tüm düşmanlar, hareket ederken yerde kanlı birer iz bırakırlar. Bu izler yerde 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca kalır. {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}, kana bulanan bu hücrelerden geçerken 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcar.
